question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. starbucks sign
B. kid
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The kid is in the foreground, partially obscuring the background, while the Starbucks sign is on a building further back, making the kid clearly closer to the camera.
